protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11329
protocol.text: plants were grown on soil at 20° C in continuous light

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11345
protocol.text: plants were watered with 1% EtOH and covered with dome for 12h

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11349
protocol.text: plants were watered and covered with dome for 12h

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11413
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction using Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Kit

protocol.name: P-MEXP-11414
protocol.text: Tissue of 20 dissected apices was pooled for RNA extraction

protocol.name: P-MEXP-12147
protocol.text: raw data (Affy .CEL files) were quantile normalized, background corrected and transformed into expression estimates by gcRMA implemented in R. All settings were standard and all files were included in a single transformation. In the resulting text output file the Affy identifiers were mapped to AGI codes using the TIGR 4.0 release. NOTE: expression estimates generated by gcRMA are log2 (log base 2) !
